question:
Given the security constraint in a DD:
101.
102. 103. Foo 104. /Bar/Baz/* 105. POST 106. 107. 108. DEVELOPER 109. 110. And given that “MANAGER” is a valid role-name, which four are true for this security constraint? (Choose four.)

options.A: MANAGER can do a GET on resources in the /Bar/Baz directory.
options.B: MANAGER can do a POST on any resource in the /Bar/Baz directory.
options.C: MANAGER can do a TRACE on any resource in the /Bar/Baz directory.
options.D: DEVELOPER can do a GET on resources in the /Bar/Baz directory.
options.E: DEVELOPER can do only a POST on resources in the /Bar/Baz directory.
options.F: DEVELOPER can do a TRACE on any resource in the /Bar/Baz directory.
